price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ihanganire ivyo bavuga bikubangamiye, uheze wibuke n’Umuja wacu Dawudi yaranzwe n’inguvu zo guhangana n’abansi ata guhesha, hamwe rero no kwihanganira igamburukiramana. Mu vy’ukuri, yarigaya cane akitura kenshi Imana Allah[2].
arabic: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
footnotes: [2] Iyi Aayah iratera intege Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

meta.transliteration: iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā dāwūda dhā al-aydi innahu awwābun
